item.text: Then he brought me back by way of the outer gate of the sanctuary that faces east, but it was shut.
The Lord said to me: “This gate will be shut; it will not be opened, and no one will enter by it. For the Lord, the God of Israel, has entered by it; therefore it will remain shut.
Only the prince may sit in it to eat a sacrificial meal before the Lord; he will enter by way of the porch of the gate and will go out by the same way.”
Then he brought me by way of the north gate to the front of the temple. As I watched, I noticed the glory of the Lord filling the Lord’s temple, and I threw myself face down.

The Lord said to me: “Son of man, pay attention, watch closely, and listen carefully to everything I tell you concerning all the statutes of the Lord’s house and all its laws. Pay attention to the entrances to the temple with all the exits of the sanctuary.
Say to the rebellious, to the house of Israel, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Enough of all your abominable practices, O house of Israel!

When you <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="01121 05236">foreigners</st>, those <st data-num="06189" class="">uncircumcised</st> in <st data-num="03820" class="">heart</st> and in <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st>, into my <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuary</st>, you <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrate</st><n id="1" /> it—even my <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>—when you <st data-num="07126" class="">offer</st> my <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st>, the <st data-num="02459" class="">fat</st> and the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>. You<n id="2" /> have <st data-num="06565" class="">broken</st> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">by</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable practices</st>.

You have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08104" class="">kept</st> <st data-num="04931" class="">charge</st> of my <st data-num="06944" class="">holy things</st>, but you have <st data-num="07760" class="">assigned</st> foreigners<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="08104" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="04931" class="">charge</st> of my <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuary</st> for you.
This is what the Sovereign Lord says: No foreigner who is uncircumcised in heart and flesh among all the foreigners who are among the people of Israel will enter into my sanctuary.
“‘But the Levites who went far from me, straying off from me after their idols when Israel went astray, will be responsible for their sin.

Yet they will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="08334" class="">ministers</st> in my <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuary</st>, having <st data-num="06486" class="">oversight</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st>, and <st data-num="08334" class="">serving</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st>. <st data-num="01992" class="">They</st> will <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughter</st> the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offerings</st> and the <st data-num="02077" class="">sacrifices</st> for the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, and <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> will <st data-num="05975" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> them to <st data-num="08334" class="">minister</st> to them.

Because they used to minister to them before their idols and became a sinful obstacle to the house of Israel, consequently I have made a vow concerning them, declares the Sovereign Lord, that they will be responsible for their sin.

They will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05066 0413">come near</st> me to <st data-num="03547" class="">serve</st> me <st data-num="03547" class="">as priest</st>, nor will they <st data-num="05066 05921">come near</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of my <st data-num="06944" class="">holy things</st>, <st data-num="0413 06944">the things</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">that are most sacred</st>. They will <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> the <st data-num="03639" class="">shame</st> of the <st data-num="08441 0834">abominable deeds</st> they have <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st>.
Yet I will appoint them to keep charge of the temple, all its service, and all that will be done in it.

“‘But the Levitical priests, the descendants of Zadok who kept the charge of my sanctuary when the people of Israel went astray from me, will approach me to minister to me; they will stand before me to offer me the fat and the blood, declares the Sovereign Lord.
They will enter my sanctuary and approach my table to minister to me; they will keep my charge.
“‘When they enter the gates of the inner court, they must wear linen garments; they must not have any wool on them when they minister in the inner gates of the court and in the temple.

<st data-num="06593" class="">Linen</st> <st data-num="06287" class="">turbans</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st> and <st data-num="06593" class="">linen</st> <st data-num="04370" class="">undergarments</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">around</st> their <st data-num="04975" class="">waists</st>; they must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02296" class="">bind</st> themselves with <st data-num="03154" class="">anything that causes sweat</st>.

When they go out to the outer court to the people, they must remove the garments they were ministering in and place them in the holy chambers; they must put on other garments so that they will not transmit holiness to the people with their garments.
“‘They must not shave their heads nor let their hair grow long; they must only trim their heads.

<st data-num="03808 03605">No</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> may <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st> when he <st data-num="0935 0413">enters</st> the <st data-num="06442" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="02691" class="">court</st>.

They must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947 0802">marry</st> a <st data-num="0490" class="">widow</st> or a <st data-num="01644" class="">divorcee</st>, <st data-num="03588 0518">but</st> they may <st data-num="03947" class="">marry</st> a <st data-num="01330" class="">virgin</st> from the <st data-num="02233 01004">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st><n id="1" /> or a <st data-num="0490" class="">widow</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="03548" class="">priest’s</st> <st data-num="0490" class="">widow</st>.
Moreover, they will teach my people the difference between the holy and the common and show them how to distinguish between the ceremonially unclean and the clean.
“‘In a controversy they will act as judges; they will judge according to my ordinances. They will keep my laws and my statutes regarding all my appointed festivals and will observe my Sabbaths.
“‘They must not come near a dead person or they will be defiled; however, for father, mother, son, daughter, brother, or unmarried sister, they may defile themselves.

<st data-num="0310" class="">After</st> a priest<n id="1" /> has become <st data-num="02893" class="">ceremonially clean</st>, they<n id="2" /> must <st data-num="05608" class="">count off</st> a period of <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> for him.
On the day he enters the sanctuary into the inner court to serve in the sanctuary, he must offer his sin offering, declares the Sovereign Lord.
“‘This will be their inheritance: I am their inheritance, and you must give them no property in Israel; I am their property.

<st data-num="01992" class="">They</st> may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>, the <st data-num="02403" class="">sin offering</st>, and the <st data-num="0817" class="">guilt offering</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="02764" class="">devoted thing</st> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> theirs.

The <st data-num="07225" class="">first</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01061 03605">firstfruits</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="08641" class="">contributions</st> of <st data-num="03605 03605 08641">any kind</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> for the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st>; you will also <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> to the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> the <st data-num="07225" class="">first portion</st> of your <st data-num="06182" class="">dough</st>, so that a <st data-num="01293" class="">blessing</st> may <st data-num="05117" class="">rest</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.
The priests will not eat any bird or animal that has died a natural death or was torn to pieces by a wild animal.
